articles.author: JAKE COYLE, LINDSEY BAHR
articles.title: The best movies of 2024 as ranked by AP film writers - The Associated Press
articles.description: Break out your “Dune” popcorn bucket: It's time for the best movies of the year. Associated Press Film Writer Jake Coyle and Lindsey Bahr name their top films of 2024. Their lists are topped by the sublime Indian drama “All We Imagine As Light” and the WWII d…
articles.content:
As much as theaters are humming right now, with Wicked and Moana 2" bringing moviegoers by the droves, its been a fairly bruising movie year. 
In between the blockbusters, though, the challenge of n… [+10502 chars]
